extension.summary: אלפי פלייליסטים וסטים מוזיקליים, ערוכים ומוכנים להאזנה, ומותאמים לכל מצב, בכל מקום ובכל שעה
Thousands of premium music playlists for any mood, activity and time!
extension.description: ברוכים הבאים לתוסף eco99music מבית תחנת הרדיו eco99fm. מחכים לכם כאן אלפי פלייליסטים וסטים מוזיקליים, ערוכים ומוכנים להאזנה, ומותאמים לכל מצב, בכל מקום ובכל שעה. תהנו, האזנה נעימה! לתשומת לבכם- התוכן זמין ופעיל בישראל בלבד.

Welcome to eco99music, an innovative music application based on the consumer possibilities of the listener and browser, and adapts edited music playlists for the current and relevant status of each listener. The app offers the consumers a unique and personalizes service, based on their location, activity, time of the day and their mood. Enjoy! … FYI - our content is available only in Israel.
extension.disclaimer: This is an official ECO 99FM Kodi add-on
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007

extension.description: Радио TuneIn е безплатна услуга, която ви позволява да слушате всичко, независимо къде се намирате. Каквото желаете - музика, спорт или новини. Радио TuneIn предлага над 50 000 станции от които да избирате. Можете да намерите местните станции или да откриете нови станции от целия свят. Радио TuneIn ви отвежда точно където желаете да сте.

TuneIn Radio is a free service that lets you listen to anything in the world from wherever you are. Whether you want to hear music, sports, news or current events. TuneIn Radio offers over 50,000 stations for you to choose from. From finding local stations to discovering new stations from around the world, TuneIn Radio brings you to where you want to be.

TuneIn Radio ist ein kostenloser Service, mit dem Sie alles in der Welt, wo immer Sie sind, hören können. Ob Sie Musik, Sport, Nachrichten oder aktuelle Ereignisse hören wollen. TuneIn Radio hält über 50.000 Sender für Sie bereit. Von der Suche nach lokalen Sender, bis zum entdecken neue Sender aus der ganzen Welt. TuneIn Radio bringt Sie, wohin sie wollen.

TuneIn Radio es un servicio gratuito que te permite escuchar cualquier cosa del mundo desde donde te encuentres. Si deseas escuchar música, deportes, noticias o eventos actuales. TuneIn Radio ofrece más de 50,000 estaciones radiales para escoger, desde estaciones locales hasta descubrir nuevas estaciones alrededor del mundo, TuneIn Radio te lleva a donde tu quieras estar.

Το ραδιόφωνο TuneIn είναι μία δωρεάν υπηρεσία το οποίο σας επιτρέπει να ακούτε οποιοδήποτε σταθμό από όλο τον κόσμο, από όπου και αν βρίσκεστε. Ακόμη και αν θέλετε να ακούσετε μουσική, αθλητικά γεγονότα, ειδήσεις και άλλα γεγονότα, το ραδιόφωνο TuneIn προσφέρει πάνω από 50.000 σταθμούς για εσάς να διαλέξετε. Είτε θέλετε να ακούσετε τοπικούς σταθμούς είτε να ανακαλύψετε νέους από όλο τον κόσμο, το ραδιόφωνο TuneIn σας πηγαίνει όπου θελήσετε να βρεθείτε.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007

extension.description: Much better Log popup

extension.summary: Put all your favourites bits of all your favourites addons into one easy to use addon.
extension.description: Super Favourites is a better way of managing your Kodi Favourites.[CR][CR]Virtually any menu item within Kodi can be added to Super Favourites, even from addons that don't normally provide this feature.[CR][CR]Super Favourites allows you to better manage your Kodi favourites, including the creation of sub-folders, into which your Kodi favourites can then be copied or moved into.[CR][CR]This allows you to create you own custom addon with just the best bits of your favourite addons. Search your favourite addons, play your favourite music, read your favourite comic strips, select your favourite playlists, browse your favourite movies, listen to your favourite radio stations, watch your favourite cartoons, the possibilities are endless, all from within one easy to use addon.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
extension.news: 1.0.59: 29th May 2017 - 'Now playing' text now defined by SF due to skin variations
